楼主和客服都不容易啊 

谷歌翻译传送门

消息文本

20:51 UTC

Many thanks!

Hello! Is there any chance that you can try to add another mailbox into the Outlook Mobile app and check if you will have a possibility to add the contact on this account?

I added my other mailbox, but my phone will still flash back then I click "Create" Button

replies.txt_content: 客服：你当我们只有一个人吗
